name: Attack of the Snow Goons
description:
! WARNING !

The game autosaves the score but you need to disable your ADblocker in order to properly save on browser.

If the controls aren't working or the mouse isn't recognized when you start the game on browser, just refresh the page. This should fix the issue.

You can download the desktop game for a better experience. Windows only.

The Game

A simple top-down shooter video game. Kill the snow goons before they reach the Christmas tree, collect the presents for some upgrades.

The game is slightly inspired but the Calvin&Hobbes collection "Attack of the Deranged Mutant Killer Monster Snow Goons" [link] a comic which I love.

Made in 9 days for the #UntitledGameJam 39, the theme was "Snow".

Soundtrack -  Waltz Of The Flowers from "The Nutracker".

Controls

Mouse - point direction;
Left click - shot;
Right click - bomb;
W - walk forward;
S - walk backward;
F - full screen.

Softwares

  • Game Engine - Game Maker Studio 2;
  • Graphic Design - Adobe Illustrator, Paint.NET;
  • Sound Design - Adobe Audition, Bfxr.

PROUDLY MADE IN ITALY BY ZENO BIANCHINI AND WOLF GAMES
